description:
Welcome to the police chase vs thief: police car chase game. Like a city police driver chase thief car and smash car to burn out. In thief chasing games act as a police force agent and do your police duty. Drive cop vehicles for thief car chasing in the modern city environment with fast driving skills. Police cars are very helpful to eliminate the crime from the city. Enjoy passionate car racing challenge of police vs gangsters. Learn how city police chasing thief car like a true cop racer to thief arrest and become a super cop officer. In this police vs thief game, your duty is to act as a police officer and thief catcher like city savior. During Police patrol pursuit thief car and smash that to burn out the criminal car. 

In different thief games or criminal escape simulator you act as an undercover agent of intelligence agencies. Now, as a cop chase robbers like any other police vs robber games. Police chase vs thief: police car chase game is actually police and thief car racing simulator game. In this police chasing game you have variety of latest model police sports cars to follow thief cars. Police vs gangster thief chasing is challenging racing between cop cars and thief cars. 

Police Chase vs Thief: Police Car Chase Game Features
* Realistic and Stunning graphics
* Smooth and efficient controls 
* Different challenging thief chasing missions
* Variety of different luxury police cars 
* Realistic 3D city environment 

Police chasing games are very interesting police games to those who will join police force. Sound the police siren, chase thieves and not let them to escape from you. Play this police chase vs thief: police car chase game and become a real super cop vehicles driver. You are the real police car driver and police car chasing game needs car driving skills to drive fast during thief chasing.
